it.unifi.rc.httpserver

Interface HTTPServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyHTTPServer

    public interface HTTPServer
    A HTTP Server.
    Author:
    loreti

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHandler(HTTPHandler handler)
      Adds a new handler in the server.
      void start()
      Start the server.
      void stop()
      Stops the server.

    • Method Detail

      • addHandler

        void addHandler(HTTPHandler handler)
        Adds a new handler in the server. Each server has a list of HTTPHandler. A request is handled by the first handler that is able to handle it.
        Parameters:
        handler - an HTTPHandler.

      • start

        void start()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Start the server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the server.
